mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, B.ATTEND_NO, B.LECTURE_CODE, B.LECTURE_NAME , C.EVALSTUDY_CODE, C.EVALSTUDY_TYPE, C.EVALSTUDY_RATIO , D.EXAM_NO, D.EXAM_TYPE, E.QUESTION_NO, E.OBJECTIVE_ANSWER, E.SUBJECTIVE_ANSWER , F.ANSWER_NO, F.PROBLEM_NO, F.SUBJECTIVE_ANSWER FROM USERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTEND B ON(A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN EVALUATIONSTUDY C ON(B.LECTURE_CODE = C.LECTURE_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN EXAM D ON(C.EVALSTUDY_CODE = D.EVALSTUDY_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN EXAMQUESTION E ON(D.EXAM_NO = E.EXAM_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN EXAMANSWER F ON(E.EXAM_NO = F.EXAM_NO AND E.QUESTION_NO = F.QUESTION_NO) WHERE A.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND B.LECTURE_CODE = #{lecture_code} ORDER BY B.ATTEND_NO, C.EVALSTUDY_CODE, D.EXAM_NO, E.QUESTION_NO, F.ANSWER_NO

SELECT A.USER_ID, B.LECTURE_CODE, B.CLASS_IDENTIFYING_CODE , C.ABSENCE_NO, C.ABSENCE_WEEK, C.ABSENCE_CLASS, C.ABSENCE_YN , D.ASSIGNMENT_NO, E.SUBMITFILE_NO, E.ASSIGNMENT_NO, E.FILE_MARKSCORE FROM ATTEND A LEFT OUTER JOIN LECTUREWEEK B ON(A.LECTURE_CODE = B.LECTURE_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSENCE C ON(A.ATTEND_NO = C.ATTEND_NO AND B.LECTURE_WEEK = C.ABSENCE_WEEK AND B.LECTURE_CLASS = C.ABSENCE_CLASS) LEFT OUTER JOIN ASSIGNMENT D ON(B.CLASS_IDENTIFYING_CODE = D.CLASS_IDENTIFYING_CODE AND B.LECTURE_CODE = D.LECTURE_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SUBMITFILE E ON(A.ATTEND_NO = E.ATTEND_NO AND D.ASSIGNMENT_NO = E.ASSIGNMENT_NO) WHERE A.USER_ID = #{user_id} B.LECTURE_CODE = #{lecture_code} ORDER BY A.USER_ID, LECTURE_CODE, CLASS_IDENTIFYING_CODE
